resources.string: Hi, %s. We hope your visit to Dr. %s went well.
On a scale from 1–10, would you recommend Dr. %s to a friend or a family member?
Thank you! You were diagnosed with %s. Did Dr. %s explain how to manage this diagnosis in a way that made sense to you?
We appreciate your feedback! One last question… How do you feel about being diagnosed with %s?
It seems from your feedback you understood your diagnosis. We are glad to hear it! Just to make sure we got it right, you said: %s
Hmm. We can\'t figure out if you understood your diagnosis or not. Just to make sure we got it right, you said: %s
It seems from your feedback you did not understand your diagnosis. We are so sorry to hear that and we will be forwarding that on. Just to make sure we got it right, you said: %s
Your rating of %d also indicates that you would strongly recommend Dr. %s. That is awesome!
Your rating of %d also indicates that you would might recommend Dr. %s. We are sorry it was only mediocre.
Your rating of %d also indicates that you would not recommend Dr. %s. We are sorry to hear that and hope that we can improve that in the future.
To confirm, your feelings about your diagnosis are: %s
